Forcing the Portal.name: Forcing the Portal
Forcing the Portal.fullText:
Blade of Cendriane Attack 11Forcing the Portal

You strike two nearby foes, teleporting them apart to create an opening.

Encounter        Martial, Teleportation, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Primary Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you teleport the target 2 squares. Make a secondary attack.

  Secondary Target: One creature other than the primary target

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. AC

  Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier, and you teleport the target 2 squares. The target must be teleported to a space within 3 squares of the primary target.


Published in Manual of the Planes, page(s) 140.
Forcing the Portal.flavor: You strike two nearby foes, teleporting them apart to create an opening.
Forcing the Portal.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you teleport the target 2 squares. Make a secondary attack.
Forcing the Portal.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Forcing the Portal.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier, and you teleport the target 2 squares. The target must be teleported to a space within 3 squares of the primary target.

Ethereal Hunter.name: Ethereal Hunter
Ethereal Hunter.fullText:
Blade of Cendriane Utility 12Ethereal Hunter

Stepping though thin air, you blink back into existence next to your enemies, making them your prey.

Encounter        Martial, Teleportation
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You teleport 5 squares. You must teleport to a square adjacent to at least one enemy. Each enemy adjacent to you grants combat advantage to you and is designated as your quarry until the end of your next turn. The enemies don’t count against your normal limit of one quarry at a time, although you can still deal Hunter’s Quarry damage only once per round.


Published in Manual of the Planes, page(s) 140.
Ethereal Hunter.flavor: Stepping though thin air, you blink back into existence next to your enemies, making them your prey.
Ethereal Hunter.effect: You teleport 5 squares. You must teleport to a square adjacent to at least one enemy. Each enemy adjacent to you grants combat advantage to you and is designated as your quarry until the end of your next turn. The enemies don’t count against your normal limit of one quarry at a time, although you can still deal Hunter’s Quarry damage only once per round.

Feywild Tempest.name: Feywild Tempest
Feywild Tempest.fullText:
Blade of Cendriane Attack 20Feywild Tempest

You travel unseen through the battlefield, materializing to strike at a foe before disappearing and moving on to the next adversary.

Daily        Martial, Teleportation, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

Primary Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks

Hit: 1[W] damage per attack.

Effect: Teleport 5 squares. Make a secondary attack.

  Secondary Target: One creature other than the primary target

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and offhand weapon), two attacks

Hit: 1[W] damage per attack.

Effect: Teleport 5 squares. Make a tertiary attack.

  Tertiary Target: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets

  Tertiary Attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and offhand weapon), two attacks

Hit: 1[W] damage per attack.


Published in Manual of the Planes, page(s) 140.
Feywild Tempest.flavor: You travel unseen through the battlefield, materializing to strike at a foe before disappearing and moving on to the next adversary.
Feywild Tempest.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Feywild Tempest.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Feywild Tempest.effect: Teleport 5 squares. Make a secondary attack.
Feywild Tempest.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Feywild Tempest.secondaryAttack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and offhand weapon), two attacks
Feywild Tempest.secondaryeffect: Teleport 5 squares. Make a tertiary attack.
Feywild Tempest.tertiaryTarget: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets
Feywild Tempest.tertiaryAttack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and offhand weapon), two attacks
